action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself, Mr. Meuser, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Katko, Mr. LaTurner, Mr. Gimenez, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Meijer, and Mr. Van Drew) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To authorize the Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement to provide stipends to certain vetted foreign members of Transnational Criminal Investigative Units, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the DHS Transnational Criminal Investigative Units Supplemental Pay Act.

section.header: Stipends for certain vetted foreign members of Transnational Criminal Investigative Units

subsection.text: The Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement is authorized to provide stipends to vetted foreign members, as determined by the Director, of Transnational Criminal Investigative Units for participation in such Units by such members.
There is authorized to be appropriated $2,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 and 2024 to carry out this section.
